#summary scanner feeds page
<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =
The [TaxonomyImpact#Scanner scanner] assessment is typically a [TaxonomySeverity#Medium medium severity] feed depicting known malicious scanners brute-forcing the internet (ssh, portscanners, etc).

Typical examples might include items from: 
 * the [http://sshbl.org] list ([TaxonomyConfidence#41_-_74 medium] confidence)
 * the [http://dragonresearchgroup.org/insight/sshpwauth.txt DRG SSH] list ([TaxonomyConfidence#41_-_74 medium] confidence)

= Details =
== Infrastructure ==
=== API ===
{{{
GET https://cif.example.com:443/api/infrastructure/scanner?confidence=95&severity=medium
GET https://cif.example.com:443/api/infrastructure/scanner?confidence=85&severity=medium
GET https://cif.example.com:443/api/infrastructure/scanner?confidence=40&severity=medium
}}}

=== CLI ===
{{{
$ cif -q infrastructure/scanner -c 95 -s medium
$ cif -q infrastructure/scanner -c 85 -s medium
$ cif -q infrastructure/scanner -c 40 -s medium
$ cif -q infrastructure/scanner -c 95 -s medium -p iptables
$ cif -q infrastructure/scanner -c 95 -s medium -p snort
}}}
